resources.string: MyQuizApp
DB means Data Base?
for changing data of table we use the key word MODIFY
one to many is a kind of relationship
Pramiry Key is used to uniquely identify each record in a table?
validation rule should be entered for a StudentID which should start with the letter "S" is "/*S/*"
Statement: A table can have only one Primary Key
The purpose of forms is to store data
You can select multiple fields of a table in design view by using the Tap key
A single set of related data values is referred to as table
DM means Data Mainfactory
Star schema is a shap of DM
Desition tree is an algorithm of data mining
Conducting an online survey is an example of secondary research
E-mail surveys are easy to implement.
Data mining is also known as knowledge discovery in databases.
Competitive Intelligence is a one-time effort to get an accurate snapshot of the competitive landscape
Business intelligence is a systematic and ongoing monitoring of all internal and external facets of a business, which results in knowledge creation.
Some of the disadvantages of online secondary research are: the amount of information available, the time and cost of conducting the research
HCI means Human Computer intraction
Useability is so important in HCI
Customers must be considered during design
Today many aspects of human-computer interaction are influenced by older technologies
Despite its growth, the video game industry still brings in smaller revenues than the U.S. box office
The video game industry is unlike other media industries in that it has not seen consolidation
HCI is based on psychological factors of humans
Terminator films uses futuristic HCI
Well designed HCIs allow the computer to run faster
We have to download SDK with the application
The Alpha Build for the programmers
The activity has only XML file
OnRestoreInstanceState()used When activity is recreated after it was previously destroyed
Service is an application component that can perform long-running operations in the background
Services are basically containers or windows to the user interface
Activities is a component that is used to perform operations on the background. It does not have an UI.
Thread should not be used to separate long running operations from main thread so that performance is improved.
ARMv7 is the most common as it is optimised for battery consumption.
